problem.title: Problem Description
problem.text: Disorganization in market operations has led to negative consequences affecting the urban environment.

solution.title: How do we solve this problem?
solution.desc: We apply a strategy based on awareness, community participation, and environmental commitment.
solution.item1_desc: Reels, memes and educational videos on market care.
solution.item2_desc: Collective actions with neighbors and merchants.
solution.item3_desc: Show your clean stall and win prizes.
solution.item4_desc: Effort is recognized with a Green Seal.

propuesta.title: Our Proposal: Green Stall
propuesta.text: Green Stall is a community initiative to reduce pollution through education and action.

participa.title: Join the Campaign
participa.desc: Join the change by following these simple steps:
participa.step1_desc: Register online or at the market.
participa.step2_desc: Keep your area clean and organized.
participa.step4_desc: Receive a badge and monthly prizes.

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.desc: Thanks to citizen participation we are creating change.

aprende.title: Learn More
aprende.desc: Discover quick tips to reduce pollution and improve your market experience.
aprende.tip1_desc: Use clearly labeled bins. It‚Äôs easy!
aprende.tip2_desc: Show your commitment with a tidy space.

nosotros.title: About Us
nosotros.desc: We are a team committed to transforming Tambo Market.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Who can participate in Green Stall campaign?
faq.a1: All Tambo Market merchants who want to join for free.
faq.q2: What are the benefits of joining?
faq.a3: Yes, online or at info stands in the market.
faq.q4: How do I know if I'm cleaning correctly?
faq.a4: Our team will visit and give you visual guides.
